service.name: date-night-planner
service.description: AI-powered date planning with couple personalization and local integration

scenario-authenticator.purpose: Multi-tenant couple authentication and privacy controls
scenario-authenticator.fallback: Single-user mode with reduced privacy features

contact-book.purpose: Partner preferences, relationship data, and dietary restrictions
contact-book.fallback: Manual preference entry with reduced personalization

local-info-scout.purpose: Real-time venue discovery, local events, and weather-aware recommendations
local-info-scout.fallback: Static venue database with no real-time updates

research-assistant.purpose: Creative date idea research, trend analysis, and activity inspiration
research-assistant.fallback: Curated date idea database with no trend awareness
